ISSUE.TITLE: Product duplication in "Products never purchased" report
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 > For each product in the list is duplicated based on how many categories are assigned to each product. Steps to reproduce the problem: map a never purchased product to multiple categories and view the 'Products never purchased' report. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/85001/best-selling-report-counts-sales-incorrectly#273992
